sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { setUser } from './redux/actions/user_actions' class SignUp extends React.Component{ state = { first_name: "", last_name: "", username: "", location: "", email: "", phone_number: "", birthday: "", gender: "", bio: "", won_games: 0, tie_games: 0, lost_games: 0, admin: 0, team_id: null, password: "", passwordConfirmation: "" } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target) if (this.state.password === this.state.passwordConfirmation){ fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/v1/signup", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(this.state) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(response => { if(response.errors){ alert(response.errors) } else { this.props.setUser(response) localStorage.token = response.token this.setState({ first_name: "", last_name: "", username: "", location: "", email: "", phone_number: "", birthday: "", gender: "", bio: "", admin: 0, team_id: null, password: "", passwordConfirmation: "" }) } }) } else { alert("Passwords don't match!") } } componentDidMount(){ } render(){ if (this.props.currentUser !== null && this.props.currentUser !== undefined) { return ; } return (

); } } function msp(state){ return { currentUser: state.userReducer.currentUser } } export default connect(msp, { setUser })(SignUp)
